content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(0.0, 0.0) with fuel={'coal': 45}, direction=Direction.UP, energy=1600.0, and status=EntityStatus.WORKING.

### Transport Belt at position(1.5, 0.5)
Consists of a transport belt at position(1.5, 0.5) with direction=Direction.RIGHT.

### Burner Inserter at position(0.5, 2.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position(0.5, 2.5) with fuel={'coal': 9}, direction=Direction.DOWN, energy=398930.0, and status=EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.

### Belt Group
Consists of a belt group with inputs=[Belt((x=1.5 y=-0.5) -> (x=1.5 y=1.5), direction=Direction.DOWN)], outputs=[Belt((x=1.5 y=1.5) -> (x=-0.5 y=1.5), direction=Direction.LEFT)], and belts=[3 belts].

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to place an entity before placing it.
### Errors when placing entities without required items in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to place an entity.
### Errors when inserting items into entities without required items in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity.
### Errors when placing transport belts without specifying a valid direction
- Ensure you specify a valid direction when placing a transport belt.
### Errors when placing entities in occupied tiles
- Ensure the target tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.
### Errors when placing entities next to other entities with transport belts in the way
- Consider increasing the spacing, changing the direction, or changing the reference position when placing an entity next to another entity with a transport belt in the way.
### Errors when inserting items into positions instead of entities
- Ensure the second argument is an Entity or EntityGroup, not a Position, when inserting items.
### Errors when crafting items without required sub-ingredients
- Ensure you have the required sub-ingredients in your inventory or can craft them before attempting to craft an item.
### Errors when placing entities without required items in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to place an entity, such as a wooden chest.
### Errors when connecting entities without required items in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory, such as transport belts, before attempting to connect entities.
